raw_text: WEBSTER,​ SHEILA – Beloved wife of the late Mervyn,​ mother of Gordon,​ Norman and Gillian,​ mother-in-law of Michelle,​ Virginia and Jeremy,​ loving sister of the late George Davidson,​ Marie,​ sister-in-law of Valerie,​ beloved grandmother of Tamara,​ Nigel,​ Tiffany,​ Brittany and Hamish,​ great grandmother of Silas,​ passedaway peacefully at the age of 93 on the 21st of November 2023. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Thursday the 30th of November from 11 a.m. to 2.45 p.m. followed by a Service. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 3.30 p.m. for Cremation at 4.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella. (Old Crematorium).077878
